attributes.action: Sanction the United States due to human rights violations
attributes.additional_details: The United States government is facilitating an increasing number of human rights violations. Violations include discrimination against people based on sex, gender identity, race, and other protected characteristics, limitations on reproductive rights, restrictions on freedom of expression, immigration procedures and ICE conduct that results in the permanent incarceration of individuals without due process, environmental concerns and the disbandment of public facilities.
attributes.background: Announce diplomatic and environmental sanctions against the Unisted States.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/716617
